The corresponding Pit tag numbers are: 456857751C, female, 584 mm SL, 662 mm TL, 5500 g, loss of mucus, ripe and running; 456748434E (scales only), male, 561 mm SL, 649 mm TL, 4000 g, tubercles developed, ripe and running; 45686E0C45, female, 546 mm SL, 624 mm TL, 4500 g, loss of mucus, mostly spent; 46230F2C0D, male, 514 mm SL, 592 mm TL, 3750 g, tuberlces developed, ripe and running. The dry specimens are scales and both the scales and the fin clips are separated within the bag/jar by their ID numbers which are the last 5 digits of the Pit tag number.
